arts.ttl: Exclusive: Nike to Release Barcelona Long Sleeve Remake Kit
arts.sum: Footy Headlines can exclusively reveal that Nike is planning to release a special long-sleeve remake kit for FC Barcelona in late 2025.

arts.ttl: ‘They are the only ones who go out onto the pitch with no-one supporting them’ – Rayo Vallecano manager Íñigo Pérez on La Liga refereeing
arts.sum: Barcelona took on Rayo Vallecano on Monday evening at Montjüic, and played out a 1-0 win against the side from Madrid, which put them top of the table. Following the…

arts.ttl: Barcelona edge Rayo to move top of LaLiga
arts.sum: Striker Robert Lewandowski scored a first-half penalty to give Barcelona a hard-fought 1-0 home win over Rayo Vallecano on Monday that moved them to top of the LaLiga standings.

arts.ttl: Barcelona 1-0 Rayo Vallecano: Player Ratings as Barca Overtake Real Madrid as La Liga Leaders
arts.sum: Barcelona took advantage of Real Madrid and Atlético Madrid dropping points to defeat Rayo Vallecano and go top of La Liga.

arts.ttl: Barcelona 1-0 Rayo Vallecano: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Robert Lewandowski sends Barca top of La Liga
arts.sum: Barcelona capitalise on Atletico Madrid and Real Madrid dropping points to move top of La Liga, defeating Rayo Vallecano 1-0 courtesy of Robert Lewandowski's penalty.

arts.ttl: Rayo Vallecano star passes his Barcelona transfer audition despite defeat
arts.sum: Rayo Vallecano star Andrei Rațiu gave an excellent account of himself in what was considered something of an audition against Barcelona on Monday evening. The name of defender Rațiu has…

arts.ttl: Hansi Flick speaks on Jules Koundé being dropped for Rayo Vallecano clash
arts.sum: Barcelona head coach Hansi Flick this evening spoke out on his decision to drop Jules Koundé from his starting XI to face Rayo Vallecano. Barcelona are of course currently locked…

arts.ttl: Barcelona star dropped from XI vs Rayo as punishment from Hansi Flick
arts.sum: A leading member of the defensive ranks at La Liga giants Barcelona was dropped from the club’s latest line-up as punishment for being late. That’s according to Barca insider Gerard…

arts.ttl: Official: Barcelona unveil squad to face Rayo Vallecano
arts.sum: La Liga giants Barcelona have on Monday afternoon unveiled the club’s latest matchday squad. This, of course, comes as Barca prepare for a return to action later this evening. With…
